mapper.select: select agent_id from agent_collection where user_id = #{userId}
select count(id) from agent_collection where user_id = #{userId} and agent_id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.agent_module_id, a.scope_id, a.script, a.description, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.pos, a.organization_id, a.create_user, a.update_user, am.NAME as agentModuleName FROM agent_collection ac INNER JOIN agent a ON ac.agent_id = a.id INNER JOIN agent_module am ON a.agent_module_id = am.id where ac.user_id = #{userId} and a.organization_id = #{orgId}
and a.name like concat('%', #{request.keyword},'%')
